mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet__health_log (petId, logDate, foodWeight, waterWeight, litterCount, soundLevel, notes) VALUES (#{petId}, #{logDate}, #{foodWeight}, #{waterWeight}, #{litterCount}, #{soundLevel}, #{notes})
mapper.select: SELECT WEEKDAY(logDate) AS dayOfWeek, SUM(IFNULL(foodWeight, 0)) AS foodTotal, SUM(IFNULL(waterWeight, 0)) AS waterTotal FROM pet__health_log WHERE petId = #{petId} AND DATE(logDate) >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY AND DATE(logDate) <= CURDATE() + INTERVAL (6 - WEEKDAY(CURDATE())) DAY GROUP BY WEEKDAY(logDate) ORDER BY dayOfWeek
